attributes.action: Let the Public vote on Brexit with a no deal or with a deal.No second referendum
attributes.additional_details:
17,410,742 people voted to leave the European Union 
The percentage of people who voted to leave was 51.89% Vs 48.11% of people who voted to stay in. 
In a democratic society that result should be honoured. If it was won by 0.1% it should still be honoured.
A second referendum would betray this country and should not be allowed at all in any vote.
Ask the public with a vote on which they want either a no deal or a deal. Simple
attributes.background: It was written in law for this country to leave with a deal or no deal. Recent Media and MPs have put forward the idea of a second referendum. This would destroy our democracy as we see it and betray the people who voted for a type of Brexit. Second referendum should not be an option at all.
